get the reaction CH4 + 2 O2 =3D> CO2 + 2H2O to work with so=
me of the demos (diffflame).  
I was able to create a cti file but it seems=
 the flame code doesn't recognize the reaction.  If 
anyone has successfull=
y used a one step, global reaction with any of the flame code?
